entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -36.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -40.6°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
